practiceAreas: Medical Malpractice|Civil Rights|Dangerous Product Defects|Sexual Abuse|Personal Injury|White Collar Defense
description:
From our law office in Wilmington, Delaware, the dedicated legal professionals at Dalton & Associates, P.A., provide unmatched counsel and support to a diverse range of clients throughout our area who have legal needs involving any of the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Personal injury
  • Dangerous and defective products
  • Asbestos exposure and mesothelioma
  • Talcum powder litigation
  • Sexual abuse litigation
  • Civil rights litigation
  • White collar criminal defense
  • Business litigation

Over the course of our history, our law firm has grown to include an additional office in New York City, and our lawyers have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for our plaintiff injury clients adversely affected by dangerous and defective products, medical malpractice and other preventable tragedies caused by someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

Honored for our outstanding professionalism and service, our attorneys have earned consistent recognition from The Best Lawyers in America, including the organization's Lawyer of the Year award for Personal Injury Litigation - Plaintiffs. We have also received designation as among the Top Medical Malpractice Lawyers in Delaware along with many other top rankings and endorsements from our peers.

Perhaps more importantly, we have received numerous testimonials and referrals from our satisfied clients, which means you can trust that we will do all we can to help you obtain the favorable outcomes you seek for the serious legal issues affecting your life, your health and your loved ones. To find out more, you can contact Dalton & Associates, P.A., to schedule a consultation. Our law firm also offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your family members safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
